title: unnaruL nADi
sahitya:
unnaruL nADi vandEn rAmA unnata jnAna sanmArgam tanai aDaiya


anupallavi



mOnat-tavattilun inmozhi kETkum nin shevi en murai Erkkavum illaiyO
 en vinaiyAlunran vanmam mighundadO tannan-taniyAi ennai tavikka viDuvaiyO
 akhila muzhudinukkum tandai nIyanrO en pizhai poruppadum un kaDan anrO
 janana maraNamennum sAgaram tANDa nin sEvaDi malariNait-tanjamenraDaindE
